function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulty in defining quantitative metrics for occupant health in buildings","Impact":"Lack of effective collaboration between project stakeholders","Mitigation":"Employing data consultants and seeking guidance from and establishing protocols in collaboration with data scientists","Technologies":"Data analytics tools","People":"Professionals, project stakeholders","Owner":"Data consultants, data scientists"},{"Description":"Ambiguity in the type of data that should be collected","Impact":"Challenges in data collection and analysis","Mitigation":"Establishing clear guidelines and protocols for data collection","Technologies":"Data management systems","People":"Professionals, data collectors","Owner":"Project managers, data managers"},{"Description":"Difficulty of linking building-related data to occupant health","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of occupant health","Mitigation":"Integration of building management systems with health monitoring systems","Technologies":"Building automation systems, health monitoring technologies","People":"Building managers, health professionals","Owner":"Building owners, health organizations"}]}
